p: In addition, concerning to liver parameters, a significant reduction in serum ASAT was observed in animals treated with R. coccinea and C. filiformis particularly at doses of 400 mg/kg and 800 mg/kg. However, no significant difference was noted for this parameter in rats treated with G. ternifolia. On ALAT, except the animals treated with Cassytha filiformis 200 mg/kg and Gardenia ternifolia 400 mg/kg, no significant influence was noted for this hepatic parameter of animals in other lots ( p > 0.05).
